data.eml:eml: An inconspicuous, conspicuous new species of Asian pipesnake, genus Cylindrophis (Reptilia: Squamata: Cylindrophiidae), from the south coast of Jawa Tengah, Java, Indonesia, and an overview of the tangled taxonomic history of C. ruffus (Laurenti, 1768)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kieckbusch, Max, Mecke, Sven, Hartmann, Lukas, Ehrmantraut, Lisa (2016): An inconspicuous, conspicuous new species of Asian pipesnake, genus Cylindrophis (Reptilia: Squamata: Cylindrophiidae), from the south coast of Jawa Tengah, Java, Indonesia, and an overview of the tangled taxonomic history of C. ruffus (Laurenti, 1768). Zootaxa 4093 (1): 1-25, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.1.1
